description.narrative:
Insatsen övergripande mål:
1. "Contribute to reduce the most pressing needs of children affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis in Venezuela".
Insatsens specifika mål:
2. "Increased access to integrated multi-sectoral education and protection services for the children most affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis Venezuela".

Rädda Barnen (Save the Children Sweden) has applied to Sida for funding of 1 452 810 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Multi-sectoral humanitarian assistance to vulnerable children and their families affected by the crisis in Venezuela" during 2020-2021.
The project's overall objective:
1. "Contribute to reduce the most pressing needs of children affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis in Venezuela"
The project's specific objective:
2. "Increased access to integrated multi-sectoral education and protection services for the children most affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis Venezuela"
Rädda Barnen will collaborate with local civil society organisations "Fe y Alegria" (F&A) and "Fundación Amigos del Niño que Amerita Protección" (FUNDANA). Rädda Barnen has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number ECHO/-AM/BUD/2020/91040. The contribution's total budget is 1 540 000 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 15 616 597 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 1 452 810 SEK, which corresponds to 10 percent of the total budget.

Rädda Barnen har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 1 452 810 SEK för EU-projektet "Multi-sectoral humanitarian assistance to vulnerable children and their families affected by the crisis in Venezuela" för perioden 2020-2021.
Insatsen övergripande mål är att:
1. "Contribute to reduce the most pressing needs of children affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis in Venezuela"
Insatsens specifika mål:
2. "Increased access to integrated multi-sectoral education and protection services for the children most affected by the Venezuelan socio-economic and political crisis Venezuela"
Rädda Barnen kommer att arbeta i samverkan med de lokala civilsamhällesorganisationerna "Fe y Alegria" (F&A) och "Fundación Amigos del Niño que Amerita Protección" (FUNDANA). Rädda Barnen har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer ECHO/-AM/BUD/2020/91040. Insatsen har en total budget på 1 540 000 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 15 616 597 SEK. Av detta har Rädda Barnen beviljats 1 400 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 1 452 810 SEK (cirka 10 procent) från Sida.

tag.narrative: 4.1 - By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes.
4.1 - Senast 2030 säkerställa att alla flickor och pojkar fullbordar avgiftsfri och likvärdig grundskole- och gymnasieutbildning av god kvalitet som leder till relevanta och ändamålsenliga kunskaper.
